metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18922 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was discovered that websockets.c in LibVNCServer prior to 0.9.12 did not properly decode certain WebSocket frames. A malicious attacker could exploit this by sending specially crafted WebSocket frames to a server, causing a heap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.13+dfsg-1').
veyon package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
x11vnc package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
